document_name: Decree No. 2003-142 of 30 April 2003 on the establishment, powers and functioning of the National Committee on Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BEN/2003/BEN-2003-12-25-Decree No. 2003-142 of 30 April 2003 on the establishment, powers and functioning of the National Committee on Climate Change_3b9de449400a8ca1bd3b8e021e90af29.pdf
document_description: This decree creates the country's National Committee on Climate Change. The Committee is in charge of following, supporting and implementing UNFCCC-related work, and to study scientific, technologic and any other matter related to climate change. The decree determines the exact attributions of the Committee and its composition.
